Why Vedic Brew?

Ancient wisdom meets modern wellness. Discover the comprehensive benefits of our signature blend.

100% Organic

Sourced directly from certified organic farms, ensuring zero pesticides.

Provides a sustained energy boost without the jittery crash of coffee.

Ingredients known to enhance focus and reduce mental fatigue.

Digestive Aid

Ginger and Tulsi help soothe the stomach and improve digestion.

The Science Behind the Brew

Our blend isn't just tradition; it's backed by science. Each ingredient is selected for its bio-active compounds.

  • Curcumin (Turmeric): A potent anti-inflammatory compound.
  • Gingerol (Ginger): Known to aid digestion and reduce nausea.
  • Piperine (Black Pepper): Increases Curcumin absorption by 2000%.
  • Eugenol (Holy Basil): Reduces stress and cortisol levels.

Frequently Asked Questions

Curious? We have answers.

Product & Ingredients

Is the tea 100% organic?

Yes, every single ingredient is sourced from USDA certified organic farms in India.

Does it contain caffeine?

Our Energy Blend contains organic green tea (low caffeine). Our Immunity and Calm blends are 100% caffeine-free.

Are the tea bags plastic-free?

Checking this box means YES! Our tea bags are made from corn starch and are fully biodegradable.

Shipping & Orders

How long does shipping take?

We ship within 24 hours. Standard delivery is 3-5 business days.

Do you ship internationally?

Currently we ship to US, Canada, and UK. We are expanding soon!

What is your return policy?

If you don't love your first box, it's on us. 30-day money-back guarantee.
